page.title: 19Landscape and Buildings
page.content: Surprisingly many people we interviewed said that they were not aware of any{construction}taking place in the village. In point of fact there were several major{projects}under way or which have recently been{completed.} They are at Pinfold Close, Meadows Close, Repton Primary Shool, Homelands - an old people's home, The Abbey - a girl's boarding house, the health centre. The most recent major building in the area was the conversion of the Old Sanatorium into a music school as part of Repton School's half a million pound development programme. This was opened in July by the Duchess of Kent.
